name: R4B-QuestionnaireResponse-R5-QuestionnaireResponse
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B QuestionnaireResponse into FHIR R5

element.display: A structured set of questions and their answers

target.display: A structured set of questions and their answers
target.comment: R4B `QuestionnaireResponse` maps as Equivalent to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse`

element.display: Person who received and recorded the answers

target.display: The individual or device that received and recorded the answers
target.comment: R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.author` maps as Equivalent to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.author`
R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.authored` maps as Equivalent to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.authored`
R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.basedOn` maps as Equivalent to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.basedOn`
R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.contained`

target.display: Encounter the questionnaire response is part of
target.comment: R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.encounter` maps as Equivalent to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.encounter`

R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.id`

element.display: Unique id for this set of answers

target.display: Business identifier for this set of answers
target.comment: R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.identifier` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.identifier` - identifier changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *)

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.implicitRules`
R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.item` maps as Equivalent to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.item`
R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.item.answer` maps as Equivalent to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.answer`

R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.item.answer.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.answer.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.item.answer.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.answer.id`
R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.item.answer.item` maps as Equivalent to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.answer.item`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.item.answer.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.answer.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.item.answer.value[x]` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.answer.value[x]` - value[x] made the element mandatory; value[x] increased the minimum cardinality from 0 to 1; value[x] has change due to type change: R4B `value[x]` `Attachment` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `value[x]`; value[x] has change due to type change: R4B `value[x]` `Quantity` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `value[x]`
R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.item.definition` maps as Equivalent to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.definition`

R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.item.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.item.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.id`
R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.item.item` maps as Equivalent to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.item`

element.display: Pointer to specific item from Questionnaire

target.display: Pointer to specific item from Questionnaire
target.comment: R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.item.linkId` maps as Equivalent to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.linkId`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.item.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Name for group or question text

target.display: Name for group or question text
target.comment: R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.item.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.text`

R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0
R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.meta`

R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.partOf` maps as Equivalent to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.partOf`

target.display: Canonical URL of Questionnaire being answered
target.comment: R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.questionnaire` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.questionnaire` - questionnaire made the element mandatory; questionnaire increased the minimum cardinality from 0 to 1

element.display: The person who answered the questions

target.display: The individual or device that answered the questions
target.comment: R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.source` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.source` - source has change due to type change: R4B `source` `Reference` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `source`

R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.status` maps as Equivalent to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/questionnaire-answers-status|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/questionnaire-answers-status|5.0.0 (Equivalent)
R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.subject` maps as Equivalent to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.subject`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `QuestionnaireResponse.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.text`
